caption: On New Year's Eve, a captain walked into the terminal building, his name was Torrance. He would fly Flight 119 from Singapore to Hawaii to reunite with his daughter. After boarding the plane, he greeted the co-pilot and all the flight attendants. A staff member told him that the plane would encounter bad weather. The captain didn't think too much, he was experienced and believed there wouldn't be any problems. At this moment, a police officer arrived and told Torrance that he needed to escort a prisoner on the plane. Although he was unwilling, he had no choice and told them to sit away from the passengers.
